1011000101000111 1100101111101110 1 -> sum: 0111110100110110, cout: 1

0100111110001110 1100001111100110 0 -> sum: 0001001101110100, cout: 1

1111100110100101 0000110001110000 0 -> sum: 0000011000010101, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
